name: Step 2: Set up dashboard (CTRL+SHIFT+D)
info:
Fill in all required information in the dashboard.
But do not enable start flow yet!

The dashboard can be opened using CTRL+SHIFT+D or by going to 127.0.0.1:1880/ui/

If no password is needed for domoticz or your mqtt broker, just leave username and password empty. If everything is filled in, click save.

Select all devices types you want to create. Don't forget to click save too, as this is a separate dashboard.

Open the "Daikin Cloud" node and enter your username and password you use for the app. This node does not support logins using facebook, so you need to create an account using an e-mailaddress.

name: Set MQTT Connection
Set Devices
Read Devices
Read kWh
Read kwhData File on Start
Set File Location
func:
msg.filename = flow.get("ConfigurationFilePath")+"MQTTADSettings"
node.send([[msg], null, null])

msg.filename = flow.get("ConfigurationFilePath")+"DomoticzSettings"
node.send([null, [msg], null])

msg.filename = flow.get("ConfigurationFilePath")+"kwhData"
node.send([null, null, [msg]])

return null;

name: Step1: Configuration File
info:
Set the location of the configuration files in the Configuration File node. 

For example /home/pi/Daikinconfig/

Don't forget the / at the end and beginning.
The files are used to store your dashboard settings, and to store kwh data in case you have to restart node red.

Now deploy the flow in nodered.

info: Go back to the dashboard (CTRL+SHIFT+D) and enable start flow and save settings.
